# Task

Write a function `wrap_string`. It iterates over words and it will add a new line each time a maximum `text_width::Int=10` would be exceeded. Provide an example



# Data

wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")

# Solution

```julia
function wrap_string(str::String; text_width::Int = 10)
    words = split(str, " ")
    lines = []
    current_line = ""
    for word in words
        if length(current_line) + length(word) <= text_width
            current_line *= " $word"
        else
            push!(lines, current_line)
            current_line = "$word"
        end
    end
    push!(lines, current_line)
    return join(lines, "\n")
end
```

# Example

```julia
wrap_string("This function will wrap words into lines")  # Output: "This function\nwill wrap words\ninto lines"
```
